title: Darker Than Amber
description: A great bestseller starring Travis McGee, a real American hero--and maybe the star of a new movie franchise! Reissue.Helping damsels in distress is nothing new for Travis McGee--it's basically how he spends his life. But this one was different right from the start. Tossed off a bridge with cement wired to her feet, dragged to safety by Travis and Meyer, she was a hot Eurasian beauty with a cold heart...ready to snare them in a murder racket to end all murders....
author: John D. MacDonald
